snippet: A judge has dismissed San Jose’s antitrust claims against Major League Baseball, which accuses M.L.B. of conspiring against the Athletics’ proposal to move to a ballpark in San Jose.
abstract: Federal judge in San Francisco dismisses San Jose’s antitrust claims against Major League Baseball, but allows city to pursue allegations of contract interference in connection with the Oakland Athletics’ stalled relocation plans.
lead_paragraph: A judge has dismissed San Jose’s antitrust claims against Major League Baseball, which accuses M.L.B. of conspiring against the Athletics’ proposal to move to a ballpark in San Jose.

headline.print_headline: Judge Rules Against San Jose in Antitrust Case
